errors.msg: Agent has reached maximum active tasks
errors.name: MaxActiveTasksReached

errors.msg: Agent has active tasks and cannot be deregistered
errors.name: AgentHasActiveTasks

errors.msg: Only the agent authority can perform this action
errors.name: UnauthorizedAgent

errors.msg: Task is not open for claims
errors.name: TaskNotOpen

errors.msg: Only the task creator can perform this action
errors.name: UnauthorizedTaskAction

errors.msg: Worker has already claimed this task
errors.name: AlreadyClaimed

errors.msg: Worker has not claimed this task
errors.name: NotClaimed

errors.msg: Not authorized to vote (not an arbiter)
errors.name: NotArbiter

docs: Cancel an unclaimed or expired task and reclaim funds.
instructions.name: cancel_task

docs: Claim a task to signal intent to work on it.
Agent must have required capabilities and task must be claimable.
instructions.name: claim_task

docs: Submit proof of work and mark task portion as complete.
For collaborative tasks, multiple completions may be needed.
* `ctx` - Context with task, worker claim, and reward accounts
* `proof_hash` - 32-byte hash of the proof of work
instructions.name: complete_task

docs: Create a new task with requirements and optional reward.
Tasks are stored in a PDA derived from the creator and task ID.
* `ctx` - Context with task account and creator
* `reward_amount` - SOL or token reward for completion
* `max_workers` - Maximum number of agents that can work on this task
instructions.name: create_task

docs: Deregister an agent and reclaim rent.
Agent must have no active tasks.
instructions.name: deregister_agent

docs: Called once to set up global parameters.
instructions.name: initialize_protocol

docs: Creates a dispute that requires multi-sig consensus to resolve.
* `evidence_hash` - Hash of evidence supporting the dispute
instructions.name: initiate_dispute

docs: Register a new agent on-chain with its capabilities and metadata.
Creates a unique PDA for the agent that serves as its on-chain identity.
* `ctx` - Context containing agent account and signer
instructions.name: register_agent

docs: Requires sufficient votes to meet threshold.
instructions.name: resolve_dispute

docs: Update an existing agent's registration data.
Only the agent's authority can modify its registration.
instructions.name: update_agent

docs: Used for broadcasting state changes to other agents.
instructions.name: update_state

docs: Arbiters must be registered agents with arbitration capability.
instructions.name: vote_dispute

metadata.description: AgenC Decentralized Agent Coordination Protocol for Solana
metadata.name: agenc_coordination

docs: Emitted when a new agent registers
types.name: AgentRegistered

docs: Emitted when an agent updates its registration
types.name: AgentUpdated

docs: Emitted when a dispute is initiated
types.name: DisputeInitiated

docs: Emitted when a dispute is resolved
types.name: DisputeResolved

docs: Emitted when a vote is cast on a dispute
types.name: DisputeVoteCast

docs: Minimum votes needed to resolve dispute (percentage, 1-100)
fields.name: dispute_threshold

docs: Protocol fee in basis points (1/100th of a percent)
fields.name: protocol_fee_bps

docs: Minimum stake required to register as arbiter
fields.name: min_arbiter_stake

docs: Emitted when coordination state is updated
types.name: StateUpdated

docs: Emitted when a task is cancelled
types.name: TaskCancelled

docs: Emitted when an agent claims a task
types.name: TaskClaimed

docs: Emitted when a task is completed
types.name: TaskCompleted

docs: Emitted when a new task is created
types.name: TaskCreated
